verses.verse: ALEPH. Blessed <S%H835><s%> are the undefiled <S%H8549><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> who walk <S%H1980><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that keep <S%H5341><s%> his testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> and that seek <S%H1875><s%> him with the whole <S%H3605><s%> heart. <S%H3820><s%>
They also <S%H637><s%> do <S%H6466><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> iniquity: <S%H5766><s%> they walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways. <S%H1870><s%>
You have commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to keep <S%H8104><s%> your precepts <S%H6490><s%> diligently. <S%H3966><s%>
O that my ways <S%H1870><s%> were directed <S%H3559><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> your statutes! <S%H2706><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shall I not be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> when I have respect <S%H5027><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you with uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of heart, <S%H3824><s%> when I shall have learned <S%H3925><s%> your righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
I will keep <S%H8104><s%> your statutes: <S%H2706><s%> O forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not utterly. <S%H3966><s%>
BETH. Wherewithal <S%H4100><s%> shall a young <S%H5288><s%> man cleanse <S%H2135><s%> his way? <S%H734><s%> by taking heed <S%H8104><s%> thereto according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>
With my whole <S%H3605><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> have I sought <S%H1875><s%> you: O let me not wander <S%H7686><s%> from your commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
Your word <S%H565><s%> have I hid <S%H6845><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> that I might not sin <S%H2398><s%> against you.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> are you, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> teach <S%H3925><s%> me your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
With my lips <S%H8193><s%> have I declared <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
I have rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of your testimonies, <S%H5715><s%> as much as in all <S%H3605><s%> riches. <S%H1952><s%>
I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> in your precepts, <S%H6490><s%> and have respect <S%H5027><s%> to your ways. <S%H734><s%>
I will delight <S%H8173><s%> myself in your statutes: <S%H2708><s%> I will not forget <S%H7911><s%> your word. <S%H1697><s%>
GIMEL. Deal <S%H1580><s%> bountifully <S%H1580><s%> with your servant, <S%H5650><s%> that I may live, <S%H2421><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> your word. <S%H1697><s%>
Open <S%H1540><s%> you my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> that I may behold <S%H5027><s%> wondrous <S%H6381><s%> things out of your law. <S%H8451><s%>
I am a stranger <S%H1616><s%> in the earth: <S%H776><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> not your commandments <S%H4687><s%> from me.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> breaks <S%H1638><s%> for the longing <S%H8375><s%> that it has to your judgments <S%H4941><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> times. <S%H6256><s%>
You have rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> that are cursed, <S%H779><s%> which do err <S%H7686><s%> from your commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
Remove <S%H1556><s%> from me reproach <S%H2781><s%> and contempt; <S%H937><s%> for I have kept <S%H5341><s%> your testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
Princes <S%H8269><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> did sit <S%H3427><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> against me: but your servant <S%H5650><s%> did meditate <S%H7878><s%> in your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
Your testimonies <S%H5713><s%> also are my delight <S%H8191><s%> and my counsellors. <S%H6098><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> sticks <S%H1692><s%> to the dust: <S%H6083><s%> quicken <S%H2421><s%> you me according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>
I have declared <S%H5608><s%> my ways, <S%H1870><s%> and you heard <S%H6030><s%> me: teach <S%H3925><s%> me your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
Make me to understand <S%H995><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of your precepts: <S%H6490><s%> so shall I talk <S%H7878><s%> of your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> melts <S%H1811><s%> for heaviness: <S%H8424><s%> strengthen <S%H6965><s%> you me according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>
Remove <S%H5493><s%> from me the way <S%H1870><s%> of lying: <S%H8267><s%> and grant <S%H5414><s%> me your law <S%H8451><s%> graciously. <S%H2603><s%>
I have chosen <S%H977><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of truth: <S%H530><s%> your judgments <S%H4941><s%> have I laid <S%H7737><s%> before me.
I have stuck <S%H1692><s%> to your testimonies: <S%H5715><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> put me not to shame. <S%H954><s%>
I will run <S%H7323><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you shall enlarge <S%H7337><s%> my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
HE. Teach <S%H3384><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of your statutes; <S%H2706><s%> and I shall keep <S%H5341><s%> it to the end. <S%H6118><s%>
Give me understanding, <S%H995><s%> and I shall keep <S%H5341><s%> your law; <S%H8451><s%> yes, I shall observe <S%H8104><s%> it with my whole <S%H3605><s%> heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Make me to go <S%H1869><s%> in the path <S%H5410><s%> of your commandments; <S%H4687><s%> for therein do I delight. <S%H2654><s%>
Incline <S%H5186><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to your testimonies, <S%H5715><s%> and not to covetousness. <S%H1215><s%>
Turn <S%H5674><s%> away my eyes <S%H5869><s%> from beholding <S%H7200><s%> vanity; <S%H7723><s%> and quicken <S%H2421><s%> you me in your way. <S%H1870><s%>
Establish <S%H6965><s%> your word <S%H565><s%> to your servant, <S%H5650><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is devoted to your fear. <S%H3374><s%>
Turn <S%H5674><s%> away my reproach <S%H2781><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I fear: <S%H3025><s%> for your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are good. <S%H2896><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have longed <S%H8373><s%> after your precepts: <S%H6490><s%> quicken <S%H2421><s%> me in your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
VAU. Let your mercies <S%H2617><s%> come <S%H935><s%> also to me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even your salvation, <S%H8668><s%> according to your word. <S%H565><s%>
So shall I have with which <S%H1697><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> him that reproaches <S%H2778><s%> me: for I trust <S%H982><s%> in your word. <S%H1697><s%>
And take <S%H5337><s%> not the word <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> utterly <S%H3966><s%> out of my mouth; <S%H6310><s%> for I have hoped <S%H3176><s%> in your judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
So shall I keep <S%H8104><s%> your law <S%H8451><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> at liberty: <S%H7342><s%> for I seek <S%H1875><s%> your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
I will speak <S%H1696><s%> of your testimonies <S%H5713><s%> also before <S%H5048><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> and will not be ashamed. <S%H954><s%>
And I will delight <S%H8173><s%> myself in your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have loved. <S%H157><s%>

My hands <S%H3709><s%> also will I lift <S%H5375><s%> up to your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have loved; <S%H157><s%> and I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> in your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> to your servant, <S%H5650><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you have caused me to hope. <S%H3176><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is my comfort <S%H5162><s%> in my affliction: <S%H6040><s%> for your word <S%H565><s%> has quickened <S%H2421><s%> me.
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have had me greatly <S%H3966><s%> in derision: <S%H3887><s%> yet have I not declined <S%H5186><s%> from your law. <S%H8451><s%>
I remembered <S%H2142><s%> your judgments <S%H4941><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and have comforted <S%H5162><s%> myself.
Horror <S%H2152><s%> has taken <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> on me because of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> that forsake <S%H5800><s%> your law. <S%H8451><s%>
Your statutes <S%H2706><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> my songs <S%H2158><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my pilgrimage. <S%H4033><s%>
I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> and have kept <S%H8104><s%> your law. <S%H8451><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> I had, <S%H1961><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I kept <S%H5341><s%> your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
CHETH. You are my portion, <S%H2506><s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> I have said <S%H559><s%> that I would keep <S%H8104><s%> your words. <S%H1697><s%>
I entreated <S%H2470><s%> your favor <S%H6440><s%> with my whole <S%H3605><s%> heart: <S%H3820><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me according to your word. <S%H565><s%>
I thought <S%H2803><s%> on my ways, <S%H1870><s%> and turned <S%H7725><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> to your testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
I made haste, <S%H2363><s%> and delayed <S%H4102><s%> not to keep <S%H8104><s%> your commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
The bands <S%H2256><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> have robbed <S%H5749><s%> me: but I have not forgotten <S%H7911><s%> your law. <S%H8451><s%>
At midnight <S%H2676><s%> <S%H3915><s%> I will rise <S%H6965><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you because <S%H5921><s%> of your righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
I am a companion <S%H2270><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> them that fear <S%H3372><s%> you, and of them that keep <S%H8104><s%> your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
The earth, <S%H776><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of your mercy: <S%H2617><s%> teach <S%H3925><s%> me your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
You have dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> with your servant, <S%H5650><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>
Teach <S%H3925><s%> me good <S%H2898><s%> judgment <S%H2940><s%> and knowledge: <S%H1847><s%> for I have believed <S%H539><s%> your commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
Before <S%H2962><s%> I was afflicted <S%H6031><s%> I went <S%H7683><s%> astray: <S%H7683><s%> but now <S%H6258><s%> have I kept <S%H8104><s%> your word. <S%H565><s%>
You are good, <S%H2896><s%> and do good; <S%H2895><s%> teach <S%H3925><s%> me your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>

The proud <S%H2086><s%> have forged <S%H2950><s%> a lie <S%H3576><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me: but I will keep <S%H5341><s%> your precepts <S%H6490><s%> with my whole <S%H3605><s%> heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Their heart <S%H3820><s%> is as fat <S%H2954><s%> as grease; <S%H2459><s%> but I delight <S%H8173><s%> in your law. <S%H8451><s%>
It is good <S%H2896><s%> for me that I have been afflicted; <S%H6031><s%> that I might learn <S%H3925><s%> your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
The law <S%H8451><s%> of your mouth <S%H6310><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> to me than thousands <S%H505><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver. <S%H3701><s%>
Your hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> me and fashioned <S%H3559><s%> me: give me understanding, <S%H995><s%> that I may learn <S%H3925><s%> your commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
They that fear <S%H3373><s%> you will be glad <S%H8056><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> me; because <S%H3588><s%> I have hoped <S%H3176><s%> in your word. <S%H1697><s%>
I know, <S%H3045><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are right, <S%H6664><s%> and that you in faithfulness <S%H530><s%> have afflicted <S%H6031><s%> me.
Let, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, your merciful <S%H2617><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> be for my comfort, <S%H5162><s%> according to your word <S%H565><s%> to your servant. <S%H5650><s%>
Let your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to me, that I may live: <S%H2421><s%> for your law <S%H8451><s%> is my delight. <S%H8191><s%>

Let the proud <S%H2086><s%> be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> for they dealt perversely <S%H5791><s%> with me without <S%H8267><s%> a cause: <S%H8267><s%> but I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> in your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
Let those that fear <S%H3373><s%> you turn <S%H7725><s%> to me, and those that have known <S%H3045><s%> your testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
Let my heart <S%H3820><s%> be sound <S%H8549><s%> in your statutes; <S%H2706><s%> that I be not ashamed. <S%H954><s%>
CAPH. My soul <S%H5315><s%> faints <S%H3615><s%> for your salvation: <S%H8668><s%> but I hope <S%H3176><s%> in your word. <S%H1697><s%>
My eyes <S%H5869><s%> fail <S%H3615><s%> for your word, <S%H565><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When <S%H4970><s%> will you comfort <S%H5162><s%> me?
For I am become <S%H1961><s%> like a bottle <S%H4997><s%> in the smoke; <S%H7008><s%> yet do I not forget <S%H7911><s%> your statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> many are the days <S%H3117><s%> of your servant? <S%H5650><s%> when <S%H4970><s%> will you execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> on them that persecute <S%H7291><s%> me?
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have dig <S%H3738><s%> pits <S%H7882><s%> for me, which <S%H834><s%> are not after your law. <S%H8451><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> your commandments <S%H4687><s%> are faithful: <S%H530><s%> they persecute <S%H7291><s%> me wrongfully; <S%H8267><s%> help <S%H5826><s%> you me.
They had almost <S%H4592><s%> consumed <S%H3615><s%> me on earth; <S%H776><s%> but I forsook <S%H5800><s%> not your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me after your loving kindness; <S%H2617><s%> so shall I keep <S%H8104><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
For ever, <S%H5769><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> your word <S%H1697><s%> is settled <S%H5324><s%> in heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> is to all generations: <S%H1755><s%> you have established <S%H3559><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it stays. <S%H5975><s%>
They continue <S%H5975><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> according to your ordinances: <S%H4941><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> are your servants. <S%H5650><s%>
Unless <S%H3884><s%> your law <S%H8451><s%> had been my delights, <S%H8191><s%> I should then <S%H227><s%> have perished <S%H6><s%> in my affliction. <S%H6040><s%>
I will never <S%H5769><s%> <S%H3808><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> your precepts: <S%H6490><s%> for with them you have quickened <S%H2421><s%> me.
I am yours, save <S%H3467><s%> me: for I have sought <S%H1875><s%> your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have waited <S%H6960><s%> for me to destroy <S%H6><s%> me: but I will consider <S%H995><s%> your testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> an end <S%H7093><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> perfection: <S%H8502><s%> but your commandment <S%H4687><s%> is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> broad. <S%H7342><s%>
MEM. O how <S%H4100><s%> I love <S%H157><s%> your law! <S%H8451><s%> it is my meditation <S%H7881><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day. <S%H3117><s%>
You through your commandments <S%H4687><s%> have made me wiser <S%H2449><s%> than my enemies: <S%H341><s%> for they are ever <S%H5769><s%> with me.
I have more understanding <S%H7919><s%> than all <S%H3605><s%> my teachers: <S%H3925><s%> for your testimonies <S%H5715><s%> are my meditation. <S%H7881><s%>
I understand <S%H995><s%> more than the ancients, <S%H2204><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I keep <S%H5341><s%> your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
I have refrained <S%H3607><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> from every <S%H3605><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> way, <S%H734><s%> that I might keep <S%H8104><s%> your word. <S%H1697><s%>
I have not departed <S%H5493><s%> from your judgments: <S%H4941><s%> for you have taught <S%H3384><s%> me.
How <S%H4100><s%> sweet <S%H4452><s%> are your words <S%H565><s%> to my taste! <S%H2441><s%> yes, sweeter than honey <S%H1706><s%> to my mouth! <S%H6310><s%>
Through your precepts <S%H6490><s%> I get understanding: <S%H995><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I hate <S%H8130><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> way. <S%H734><s%>
NUN. Your word <S%H1697><s%> is a lamp <S%H5216><s%> to my feet, <S%H7272><s%> and a light <S%H216><s%> to my path. <S%H5410><s%>
I have sworn, <S%H7650><s%> and I will perform <S%H6965><s%> it, that I will keep <S%H8104><s%> your righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
I am afflicted <S%H6031><s%> very <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> much: <S%H3966><s%> quicken <S%H2421><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>
Accept, <S%H7521><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, the freewill <S%H5071><s%> offerings of my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and teach <S%H3925><s%> me your judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> is continually <S%H8548><s%> in my hand: <S%H3709><s%> yet do I not forget <S%H7911><s%> your law. <S%H8451><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have laid <S%H5414><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me: yet I erred <S%H8582><s%> not from your precepts. <S%H6490><s%>
Your testimonies <S%H5715><s%> have I taken as an heritage <S%H5157><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> for they are the rejoicing <S%H8342><s%> of my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
